subject: Basketball
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Jeremy Lamb had 18 points and No. 9 Connecticut beat No. 25 Harvard, 67-53, on Thursday night, spoiling the Crimson’s first game as a ranked team.
snippet: Jeremy Lamb had 18 points and No. 9 Connecticut beat No. 25 Harvard, 67-53, on Thursday night, spoiling the Crimson’s first game as a ranked team.
